name: Razor-qt LiveDVD
short_description:
This live DVD brings the speed, stability and power of the well known GNU/Linux Fedora in conjunction with an advanced, easy to use and fast desktop environment based on Qt technology . That speed has been optimized allowing a shorter installation time to hard disk, startup and shutdown faster than many popular desktop distros.

The DVD was created with support for audio, video and others by default, besides having a maximization of the right-click functionality of Dolphin file manager.

The latest update for razorqt package can be found at the following link:

http://sourceforge.net/projects/razorqt/
summary: Fedora Live Spin with the lightweight Razor-qt Desktop Environment.
